dcolumn.name: Help
dcolumn.value: Localizacion Colombia incluye las modificaciones necesarias en materia de impuestos para Colombia, manejo de retenciones de IVA, ICA y ReteFte, reporte de medios magnéticos para la DIAN, generación/validación del dígito de verificación del NIT. Desarrollado po http://globalqss.com

message.MsgText: Write-Off Amount must be equal or greater than Withholdings

element.Name: Is Use BP Tax Payer Type
element.PrintName: Is Use BP Tax Payer Type

element.Name: Is Use Org Tax Payer Type
element.PrintName: Is Use Org Tax Payer Type

dynvalrule.Name: LCO_Not Withholding Taxes
dynvalrule.Code: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_TaxCategory WHERE C_TaxCategory.C_TaxCategory_ID=C_Tax.C_TaxCategory_ID AND IsWithholding='Y')

dynvalrule.Name: LCO_Withholding Taxes
dynvalrule.Code: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_TaxCategory WHERE C_TaxCategory.C_TaxCategory_ID=C_Tax.C_TaxCategory_ID AND IsWithholding='Y')

dynvalrule.Name: LCO_Taxes From Withholding Type
dynvalrule.Code: C_Tax.C_Tax_ID IN (SELECT C_Tax_ID FROM LCO_WithholdingCalc WHERE LCO_WithholdingType_ID = @LCO_WithholdingType_ID@)

column.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.
column.Name: Client

column.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.
column.Name: Organization

column.Help: The Created field indicates the date that this record was created.
column.Name: Created

column.Help: The Created By field indicates the user who created this record.
column.Name: Created By

column.Description: Optional short description of the record
column.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.
column.Name: Description

column.Description: The record is active in the system
column.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.
column.Name: Active

column.Description: Search key for the record in the format required - must be unique
column.Help: A search key allows you a fast method of finding a particular record. If you leave the search key empty, the system automatically creates a numeric number. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).
column.Name: Search Key

column.Help: A summary entity represents a branch in a tree rather than an end-node. Summary entities are used for reporting and do not have own values.
column.Name: Summary Level

column.Help: The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.
column.Name: Default

column.Help: The Updated field indicates the date that this record was updated.
column.Name: Updated

column.Help: The Updated By field indicates the user who updated this record.
column.Name: Updated By

column.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.
column.Name: Name

field.ADFieldNameID: Is Use Org Tax Payer Type
field.Name: Is Use Org Tax Payer Type
Active
field.Description: The record is active in the system
field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

Client
field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.

field.Name: Organization
field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

field.Name: Name
field.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.

field.Name: Description
field.Description: Optional short description of the record
field.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.

field.Name: Valid from
field.Description: Valid from including this date (first day)
field.Help: The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range

field.Name: Default
field.Help: The Default Checkbox indicates if this record will be used as a default value.

field.Name: Active
field.Description: The record is active in the system
field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

field.Name: Client
field.Help: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients. Tenant is a synonym for Client.

field.Name: Organization
field.Help: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

field.Name: Name
field.Help: The name of an entity (record) is used as an default search option in addition to the search key. The name is up to 60 characters in length.

field.Name: Description
field.Description: Optional short description of the record
field.Help: A description is limited to 255 characters.

field.Name: Threshold min
field.Description: Minimum gross amount for withholding calculation
field.Help: The Threshold Minimum indicates the minimum gross amount to be used in the withholding calculation.

field.Name: Active
field.Description: The record is active in the system
field.Help: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reports. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for audit purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are invoices for this partner record existing. You de-activate the Business Partner and prevent that this record is used for future entries.

field.Name: Tax
field.Help: The Tax indicates the type of tax used in document line.

SQLStatement.statement: UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Cash Journal' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Invoice (Customer)' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Invoice (Vendor)' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='ISIC' and t.name='ISIC') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Payment' and t.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Tax Payer Type' and t.name='Tax Payer Type') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Categoría Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Category' and t.name='Withholding Category') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Cálculo Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Type' and t.name='Withholding Calc') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Regla Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Type' and t.name='Withholding Rule') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Configuración Regla Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Type' and t.name='Withholding Rule Conf') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Tab_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Retención' WHERE AD_Tab_ID=(SELECT AD_Tab_ID FROM AD_Tab t, AD_Window w WHERE t.ad_window_id = w.ad_window_id and w.name='Withholding Type' and t.name='Withholding Type') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Impuestos Colombia' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Colombian Taxes' and m.action IS NULL) AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='ISIC' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Tax Payer Type' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Categoría Retención' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Withholding Category' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Menu_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Retención' WHERE AD_Menu_ID=(SELECT AD_Menu_ID FROM AD_Menu m WHERE m.name='Withholding Type' and m.action='W') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='ISIC') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Tax Payer Type') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Categoría Retención' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Withholding Category') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Window_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Retención' WHERE AD_Window_ID=(SELECT AD_window_ID FROM AD_window w WHERE w.name='Withholding Type') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_FieldGroup_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Cálculo' WHERE AD_FieldGroup_ID=(SELECT AD_FieldGroup_ID FROM AD_FieldGroup w WHERE w.name='Calculation') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_FieldGroup_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Reglas' WHERE AD_FieldGroup_ID=(SELECT AD_FieldGroup_ID FROM AD_FieldGroup w WHERE w.name='Rules') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_FieldGroup_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retención' WHERE AD_FieldGroup_ID=(SELECT AD_FieldGroup_ID FROM AD_FieldGroup w WHERE w.name='Withholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Documento' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_WithholdingType BaseType' and rl.name='Document') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Línea' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_WithholdingType BaseType' and rl.name='Line') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Impuesto' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_WithholdingType BaseType' and rl.name='Tax') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Si' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_GenerateWithdHolding on DocType' and rl.name='Yes') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='No' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_GenerateWithdHolding on DocType' and rl.name='No') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Ref_List_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Auto' WHERE AD_Ref_List_ID=(SELECT AD_ref_list_ID FROM AD_reference r, ad_ref_list rl WHERE r.ad_reference_id=rl.ad_reference_id and r.name='LCO_GenerateWithdHolding on DocType' and rl.name='Auto') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Message_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', MsgText='No se han generado retenciones' WHERE AD_Message_ID=(SELECT AD_message_ID FROM AD_message w WHERE w.value='LCO_WithholdingNotGenerated') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Message_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', MsgText='El valor del ajuste debe ser mayor o igual que las retenciones' WHERE AD_Message_ID=(SELECT AD_message_ID FROM AD_message w WHERE w.value='LCO_WriteOffLowerThanWithholdings') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Process_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Genera Retenciones' WHERE AD_Process_ID=(SELECT AD_process_ID FROM AD_process w WHERE w.value='LCO_GenerateWithholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Impuesto Base', PrintName='Impuesto Base' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='C_BaseTax_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Base', PrintName='Tipo Base' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='BaseType') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Genera Retención', PrintName='Genera Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='GenerateWithholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Retención Factura', PrintName='Retención Factura' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_InvoiceWithholding_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Aplicable en Factura', PrintName='Aplicable en Factura' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsCalcOnInvoice') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Aplicable en Pago', PrintName='Aplicable en Pago' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsCalcOnPayment') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Modificable en Pago', PrintName='Modificable en Pago' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsModifiableOnPayment') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Modificable en Pago', PrintName='Modificable en Pago' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseBPISIC') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Usa CIIU Socio', PrintName='Usa CIIU Socio' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseBPISIC') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Usa Tipo Contribuyente Socio', PrintName='Usa Tipo Contribuyente Socio' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseBPTaxPayerType') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Usa CIIU Organización', PrintName='Usa CIIU Organización' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseOrgISIC') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Usa Tipo Contribuyente Organización', PrintName='Usa Tipo Contribuyente Organización' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseOrgTaxPayerType') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Usa Categoría Retención', PrintName='Usa Categoría Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseWithholdingCategory') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Usa Impuesto Producto', PrintName='Usa Impuesto Producto' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsUseProductTaxCategory') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Es Retención', PrintName='Es Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='IsWithholding') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'
UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU', PrintName='CIIU' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_ISIC_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU Socio Negocio', PrintName='CIIU Socio Negocio' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_BP_ISIC_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='CIIU Organización', PrintName='CIIU Organización' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_Org_ISIC_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente', PrintName='Tipo Contribuyente' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_TaxPayerType_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente Socio', PrintName='Tipo Contribuyente Socio' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_BP_TaxPayerType_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Contribuyente Organización', PrintName='Tipo Contribuyente Organización' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_Org_TaxPayerType_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Cantidad Retención', PrintName='Cantidad Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='WithholdingAmt') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Cálculo Retención', PrintName='Cálculo Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_WithholdingCalc_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Categoría Retención', PrintName='Categoría Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_WithholdingCategory_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Regla Retención', PrintName='Regla Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_WithholdingRule_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Element_Trl SET IsTranslated='Y', Name='Tipo Retención', PrintName='Tipo Retención' WHERE AD_Element_ID=(SELECT AD_Element_ID FROM AD_Element WHERE ColumnName='LCO_WithholdingType_ID') AND AD_Language LIKE 'es_%'

UPDATE AD_Column SET Callout = CASE WHEN Callout LIKE '%org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff%' THEN Callout WHEN LENGTH (TRIM (Callout)) = 0 OR Callout IS NULL THEN TO_NCHAR('org.compiere.model.CalloutPayment.invoice;org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutPayment.amounts') ELSE Callout || ';org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutPayment.amounts' END WHERE AD_Column_ID = 5355 /* Payment Invoice */

UPDATE AD_Column SET Callout = CASE WHEN Callout LIKE '%org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff%' THEN Callout WHEN LENGTH (TRIM (Callout)) = 0 OR Callout IS NULL THEN TO_NCHAR('org.compiere.model.CalloutCashJournal.invoice;org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutCashJournal.amounts') ELSE Callout || ';org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutCashJournal.amounts' END WHERE AD_Column_ID = 5354 /* Cash Journal Invoice */

UPDATE AD_Column SET Callout = CASE WHEN Callout LIKE '%org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff%' THEN Callout WHEN LENGTH (TRIM (Callout)) = 0 OR Callout IS NULL THEN TO_NCHAR('org.compiere.model.CalloutPaymentAllocate.invoice;org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutPaymentAllocate.amounts') ELSE Callout || ';org.globalqss.model.LCO_CalloutWithholding.fillWriteOff;org.compiere.model.CalloutPaymentAllocate.amounts' END WHERE AD_Column_ID = 14328 /* Payment Allocate Invoice */
UPDATE C_DOCTYPE SET GenerateWithholding = 'Y' WHERE DocBaseType IN ('API','APC') AND GenerateWithholding IS NULL
UPDATE C_DOCTYPE SET GenerateWithholding = 'A' WHERE DocBaseType IN ('ARI','ARC') AND GenerateWithholding IS NULL
UPDATE C_DOCTYPE SET GenerateWithholding = 'N' WHERE GenerateWithholding IS NULL
ALTER TABLE AD_OrgInfo ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOISIC_ADOrgInfo FOREIGN KEY (LCO_ISIC_ID) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC);
ALTER TABLE AD_OrgInfo ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOTaxPayerType_ADOrgInfo FOREIGN KEY (LCO_TaxPayerType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_TaxPayerType);
ALTER TABLE C_BPartner ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOISIC_CBPartner FOREIGN KEY (LCO_ISIC_ID) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC);
ALTER TABLE C_BPartner ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOTaxPayerType_CBPartner FOREIGN KEY (LCO_TaxPayerType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_TaxPayerType);
ALTER TABLE C_Charge ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingCategory_CCharge FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingCategory_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingCategory);
ALTER TABLE LCO_InvoiceWithholding ADD (CONSTRAINT CAllocationLine_LCOInvoiceWith FOREIGN KEY (C_AllocationLine_ID) REFERENCES C_AllocationLine);
ALTER TABLE LCO_InvoiceWithholding ADD (CONSTRAINT CInvoice_LCOInvoiceWithholding FOREIGN KEY (C_Invoice_ID) REFERENCES C_Invoice);
ALTER TABLE LCO_InvoiceWithholding ADD (CONSTRAINT CTax_LCOInvoiceWithholding FOREIGN KEY (C_Tax_ID) REFERENCES C_Tax);
ALTER TABLE LCO_InvoiceWithholding ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingRule_LCOInvoiceW FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingRule_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingRule);
ALTER TABLE LCO_InvoiceWithholding ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingType_LCOInvoiceW FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingType);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingCalc ADD (CONSTRAINT CBaseTax_LCOWithholdingCalc FOREIGN KEY (C_BaseTax_ID) REFERENCES C_Tax);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingCalc ADD (CONSTRAINT CTax_LCOWithholdingCalc FOREIGN KEY (C_Tax_ID) REFERENCES C_Tax);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingCalc ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingType_LCOWHCalc FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingType);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT CTaxCategory_LCOWithholdingRul FOREIGN KEY (C_TaxCategory_ID) REFERENCES C_TaxCategory);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOBPISIC_LCOWithholdingRule FOREIGN KEY (LCO_BP_ISIC_ID) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOOrgISIC_LCOWithholdingRule FOREIGN KEY (LCO_Org_ISIC_ID) REFERENCES LCO_ISIC);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOBPTaxPayerType_LCOWithholdi FOREIGN KEY (LCO_BP_TaxPayerType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_TaxPayerType);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOOrgTaxPayerType_LCOWithhold FOREIGN KEY (LCO_Org_TaxPayerType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_TaxPayerType);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingCalc_LCOWithhold FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingCalc_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingCalc);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingCategory_LCOWith FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingCategory_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingCategory);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRule ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingType_LCOWHRule FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingType);
ALTER TABLE LCO_WithholdingRuleConf ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingType_LCOWHRC FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingType_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingType);
ALTER TABLE M_Product ADD (CONSTRAINT LCOWithholdingCategory_MProduc FOREIGN KEY (LCO_WithholdingCategory_ID) REFERENCES LCO_WithholdingCategory);
